thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to check if there are any files in the current directory that need to be deleted. I also want to check if any of the files in the directory are related to the rock simulation script.
thoughts.reasoning: I want to make sure that the workspace is clean and that I don't accidentally delete important files. Additionally, I want to make sure that the rock simulation script is not running or related files are not present before I start any new simulations.
thoughts.plan:
- Execute the 'list_files' command with the argument 'directory' set to '.' to list all the files in the current directory.
- Review the list of files to see if there are any files that need to be deleted.
- Check if there are any files related to the rock simulation script.
- If there are any files related to the rock simulation script, stop the script or delete the related files.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be more proactive in cleaning up the workspace and making sure that I am not running any unnecessary scripts or simulations.
thoughts.speak: I am going to list all the files in the current directory and check if there are any files that need to be deleted. Additionally, I will check if there are any files related to the rock simulation script.
